Useful YouTube Videos Tutorial:ÔÉÅ

These are the useful YouTube Videos that would help you to understand how to use Sphinx. In order to show the YouTube video in the page, you need to go to the YouTube video and click Share icon then click Embed. Then copy the iframe code from Embed Video.
